name: DH Rename Login URL and Two Factor Authentication
author: Ohid

sections.description:
DH Rename Login URL and Two Factor Authentication enhances your website security by changing the default login address of WordPress admin. It protects from spammers and hackers from easily finding the default admin login address. This plugin also provides options to enable Two Factor Authentication using the popular Google Authenticator app in a most efficient way.

Privacy Notices

With the default configuration, this plugin, in itself, does not:

  • track users by stealth;
  • write any user personal data to the database;
  • send any data to external servers;
  • use cookies.
sections.faq:
Can I only use the rename login URL and deactivated the Two Factor Auth?

Yes! Both features of the plugin can be activated and deactivated separately. So you can use both features or deactivate any if want!
